text: is a 2007 fighting game developed and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It is the ninth game in the Tekken series. ==References== Category:2015 video games Category:Tekken Category:Bandai Namco games Category:Namco video games Category:3D fighting games Category:Arcade games Category:Crossover fighting games Category:Martial arts video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation VR games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Video games set in Italy Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: Tekken 7
